column4: When I plugged an USB memory key in my computer, it could be automatically detected and could be accessed as normal user, but now it needs a root user to mount and acces it and be able to copy/write to it. How can I change it back to the way it was before?
what did u change on your system?
Actually I didn't change anything, only that I accidentally closed the loading window, that appears when the device is plugged in...
